scriptLines: disjoint: false) ~> split1@(ItDept, HrDept, PayrollDept, miscellaneousDept)

properties.description: Stored procedure activity is one of the transformation activities that Data Factory supports. We run stored procedure as one of the step using this activity.

MDF are visually designed data transformations in ADF. Data flows allow data engineers to develop graphical data transformation logic without writing code.
2. Data flows are executed as activities within ADF pipeline using Data Flow Activities.
3. ADF internally handles all the code translation, spark optimization and execution of transformation.

activities.name: Copy data From MySQL to SA

dependsOn.activity: Copy data From MySQL to SA
